name: 梁文耀
objective: 本課程主要介紹平行處理的理論﹑硬体技術及可擴充式平行計算機結構 1. 平行理論: ．平行計算機模型 ．程式及網路特性 ．系統性能計算 2. 硬体技術 ．超能量處理器 ．ＶＬIＷ架構 ．向量處理器 ．共享式記憶体架構 ．超管線處理器3. 平行計算機結構 ．多重處理器系統 ．多向量處理器及ＳＩＭＤ電腦 ．多線式處理器 ．資料流處理器架構
schedule:
Week1:　　　　Introduction
Week2:　　　　Overview of the Parallel Computer Architecture
Week3:　　　　The Pipeline Architecture
Week4:　　　　The Superscaler Architecture
Week5:　　　　Tomasulo Dynamic Scheduling
Week6:　　　　Simultaneous Multithreading
Week7:　　　　Memory and Cache
Week8:　　　　Symmetric Multiprocessors
Week9:　　　　Mid-term Exam
Week10:　　　　Distributed Shared Memory
Week11:　　　　Scalable Computing
Week12:　　　　Introduction to Parallel Programming
Week13:　　　　Parallel Programming Tools
Week14-17:　　Multiprocessor SoC Design
Week18:　　　　Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Paper Reports:　　　　　　50%
Parallel Programming Term Project:　　50%
materials: J. L. Hennessy and D. A. Patterson, Computer Architecture: A Quantitative Approach, 4th ed.,Morgan Kaufmann Publishing Co., 2007
